subject: Swimming
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Although he won an Olympic gold medal at age 19, Anthony Ervin quit swimming at 22. Now, after spending time as a swimming instructor, he’s competing at the Olympic trials.
snippet: Although he won an Olympic gold medal at age 19, Anthony Ervin quit swimming at 22. Now, after spending time as a swimming instructor, he’s competing at the Olympic trials.
